mapper.select: select count(user_nickname) from tbl_user where user_nickname = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (user_number, user_nickname, user_introduce, user_career, user_career_year, user_file, user_date) values(#{userNumber}, #{userNickname}, #{userIntroduce}, #{userCareer}, #{userCareerYear}, #{userFile}, #{userDate})
